title: Confused on First Strike Cards
body: I unlocked ekko, and ashe strike cards last night before it ended, but now am unsure how to unlock them, will it happen automatically when I buy the skin?

replies.body: Any Rioter want to confirm or deny; I'm still interested, but do not want to purchase if I won't receive the first strike borders, I unlocked the icons before the event ended thinking I would get them; but Don't want to purchase the skins unless they have the borders that I already created for them.
Can anyone confirm if this is true, because I spent around 8k ip to get the first strike borders.

So does that mean I can unlock them still if I purchase the skins right now? I don't want to purchase RP/ the skins if I've missed my chance to unlock the first strike I unlocked the icons thinking I would get them but did not.
No, you won't get the first strike border now. You had to own the icon and the skin before the event ended.

The First Strike Borders were unlockable during the event, which ended last night.  It was necessary to have a project skin and their icon unlocked to receive the first strike border.  This information was provided in our[ project disruption](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) guide as well.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up and you were able to gather the materials to unlock the border!
